author: robk82
post_text: September 4, 2020 at 6:25 PM#1I'm trying to create a macro that once activated the user need only answer 3 questions and it will automatically add the item in the correct place.1. Setvar $AgendaDate= (What date would you like?)2. Setvar $AgendaTimeOn= (What time to start?)3. Setvar $AgendaTimeOff= (What time to end?)4. Assign sequ "Backline work" at $AgendaDate + $AgendaTimeOn Duration= 1sI'm just guessing really, but hopefully this gets the idea accross. I need the operator to answer questions as to what time and date to turn the sequence on and off.
title: Macro to create Agena appointment.
